programme.title: The Lake
programme.desc: A gigantic and bloodthirsty monster emerges from a lake and unleashes its fury on a small town, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake.

programme.title: Nail In the Coffin: The Fall & Rise of Vampiro
programme.desc: A rare glimpse into the legendary career of wrestling icon, Vampiro, as he grapples with his demons and life after fame. Straight from one of wrestling's most outspoken characters, this is a candid look beyond the ring

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 5
programme.desc: A deep dive into the depths of unsolved murders, mysteries, and myths with narrator Jans Holstrom.

programme.title: Red Letter Day
programme.desc: While adjusting to a new life in a quiet suburban community, a recently divorced mother and her two teens receive mysterious red letters instructing them each to kill or be killed.

programme.title: They're Inside
programme.desc: Trapped in a secluded cabin in the woods, Robin, and her sister, Cody, must overcome their dark past while battling threats from deadly masked strangers.

programme.title: 6 Degrees of Hell
programme.desc: Six individuals are caught up in a supernatural perfect storm, as an evil lays claim to one of them while threatening to tear apart the soul of a small Pennsylvania town.

programme.title: Tales of Halloween
programme.desc: Ten stories from horror's top directors. Ghosts, ghouls, monsters, and the devil delight in terrorizing unsuspecting residents of a suburban neighborhood on Halloween night. This creepy anthology combines classic Halloween tales with the stuff of nightmares.

programme.desc: A gigantic and bloodthirsty monster emerges from a lake and unleashes its fury on a small town, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake.

programme.title: Nail In the Coffin: The Fall & Rise of Vampiro

programme.title: Chronic Horror
programme.desc: Chronic Horror is a short form interview series that crosses the streams of the worlds of horror filmmaking, horror fandom, and cannabis culture. Join our host Josh Millican, a cannabis and horror expert who takes you on a ride full of laughs and enlightenment.

programme.title: Dark Nature
programme.desc: While recovering from an abusive relationship, Joy joins her friend's therapy group on an isolated mountainous retreat. Led by a doctor with experimental methods, the group is soon forced to confront a monstrous entity.

programme.title: The Monster Project
programme.desc: When aspiring horror filmmakers post an online casting call looking for “real life” monsters to interview for their upcoming documentary called, The Monster Project, they find three individuals claiming to be a skinwalker, a vampire, and a demon.
